AnvilImprovements.Description: Removes minimum and maximum XP costs on the anvil. Anvils are also less likely to break.

ArmorInvisibility.Description: Lightweight armor is invisible and does not increase mob awareness when drinking Potion of Invisibility.

BatBuckets.Description: Right-click a bat with a bucket to capture it. Right-click again to release it and locate entities around you.

BeaconsHealMobs.Description: Passive and friendly mobs will heal themselves within range of a beacon with the regeneration effect.

Beekeepers.Description: Beekeepers are villagers that trade beekeeping items. Their job site is the beehive.

BlockOfEnderPearls.Description: Ender pearl storage. Eating a chorus fruit will teleport you to the nearest ender pearl block.

BlockOfGunpowder.Description: A storage block for gunpowder. It obeys gravity and dissolves in lava.

BlockOfSugar.Description: A storage block for sugar. It obeys gravity and dissolves in water.

Bookcases.Description: Bookshelves that can hold up to 9 stacks of books and maps.

Candles.Description: Candles are made from beeswax and have a lower ambient light than torches.

CaveSpidersDropCobwebs.Description: Cave spiders have a chance to drop cobwebs.

Crates.Description: A smaller storage solution with the benefit of being transportable.

DecreaseRepairCost.Description: Combine a tool or armor with a netherite nugget on an anvil to reduce its repair cost.

DirtToPath.Description: Right-clicking dirt with a shovel turns it into grass path.

EndermitePowder.Description: Endermites drop endermite powder that can be used to locate an End City.

ExtendNetherite.Description: Extends the lifetime of netherite-based items before they despawn.

ExtractEnchantments.Description: Extract enchantments from any enchanted item into an empty book.

FeatherFallingCrops.Description: A player wearing feather falling enchanted boots will not trample crops.

GoldBars.Description: Gold variant of vanilla iron bars.

GoldChains.Description: Gold version of the vanilla chain.

GoldLanterns.Description: Gold version of the vanilla lanterns.

HoeHarvesting.Description: Right-click with a hoe to quickly harvest and replant a fully-grown crop.

HuskImprovements.Description: Husks spawn anywhere within their biome and have a chance to drop sand.

Lumberjacks.Description: Lumberjacks are villagers that trade wooden items. Their job site is the woodcutter.

MineshaftImprovements.Description: Adds decoration and more ores to mineshafts.

MoreVillageBiomes.Description: Villages can spawn in swamps and jungles.

MusicImprovements.Description:
Playing a record in a jukebox stops background music from playing at the same.
Creative music tracks may also play in survival mode.

NetheriteNuggets.Description: Netherite nuggets can be combined to create a netherite ingot.

ParrotsStayOnShoulder.Description: Parrots stay on your shoulder when jumping and falling. Crouch to make them dismount.

PathToDirt.Description: Right-clicking on a grass path block with a hoe turns it back into dirt.

PlayerState.Description: Synchronize additional state from server to client.

PortableCrafting.Description: Allows crafting from inventory if the player has a crafting table in their inventory.

PortableEnderChest.Description: Allows access to chest contents if the player has an Ender Chest in their inventory.

RedstoneLanterns.Description: A lantern that emits light when a redstone signal is received.

RedstoneSand.Description: A block that acts like sand but is powered like a block of redstone.

RemoveNitwits.Description: When any action would cause a villager to become a nitwit, it becomes an unemployed villager instead.

RemovePotionGlint.Description: Removes the potion enchantment glint so you can see what the potion color is.

ShulkerBoxTooltips.Description: Shows the contents of a Shulker Box on hover-over.

SleepImprovements.Description: Allows the night to pass when a specified number of players are asleep.

StrayImprovements.Description: Strays spawn anywhere within their biome and have a chance to drop blue ice.

TamedAnimalsNoDamage.Description: Tamed animals do not take direct damage from players.

UseTotemFromInventory.Description: As long as a Totem of Undying is in your inventory, it will be consumed to protect you from death.

VariantAnimalTextures.Description: Animals may spawn with different textures.

VariantBarrels.Description: Barrels available in all types of vanilla wood.

VariantBookshelves.Description: Bookshelves available in all types of vanilla wood.

VariantChests.Description: Chests available in all types of vanilla wood.

VariantLadders.Description: Ladders available in all types of vanilla wood.

VillagersFollowEmeraldBlocks.Description: Villagers are attracted when the player holds a block of emeralds.

WanderingTraderImprovements.Description: Wandering traders only appear near signal campfires and sell maps to biomes and structures.

WitchesDropLuck.Description: A witch has a chance to drop a Potion of Luck when killed by a player.

Woodcutters.Description: A functional block that adds more efficient recipes for crafting wooden stairs and slabs.
